patterns: how to select a good computer
how to select a good laptop
responses: Don't buy laptops that go below 8th gen CPUs
HP, Dell, MSI, ASUS and Lenovo are the best options
laptops with a dedicated graphics card are good for editing and design
Android phones have better user interface
Google, Samsung and OnePlus are flagship brands
Huawei, Xiaomi, Oppo and Vivo have good products for lower budgets
